0.name: {~00AAFF}Third Upgrade Mod Changelog 3.3.0}
0.text:
[*] Countless fixes to new town plugin.
[*] Now Great Capitol can be built one per player.
[*] Now Great Capitol needs Castle Level 3 in order to be built.
[*] Universal Upgrades option can be enabled now.
[*] Removed the annoying message about guards when you click on Castle.
[*] Capitol can be built in every town option is enabled by default.
[*] Allow Building Twice per Day is enabled by default.

And much more! More info in Third Upgrade Mod's Discord Channel.

1.name: {~FFE400}Wog options disabled for TUM}
1.text:
The following Wog Options are disabled by default in TUM due to incompatibilities:

[-] Rebalanced Creatures.
[-] Enhanced Monsters.
[-] Upg level 7 become level 8.
[-] Extended Upgrades.
[-] Adittional Uprades.
[-] Castle Upgrading.
[-] Rampart Farie Dragon.
[-] Buckler of Beelzebub.
[-] Enhanced Creatures.
[-] Combo artifacts from Enhanced Artifacts II.
[-] Monster Specialities from Hero Specialization Boosts.
